assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Рим in весна
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and inviting, showcasing the beauty of spring in Rome
assetRequirements.content_context: A picturesque view of blooming flowers and iconic landmarks in Rome, emphasizing the soft climate and fewer tourists.

assetRequirements.purpose: visual representation of cultural experiences in Рим
assetRequirements.visual_style: elegant and artistic, highlighting cultural sites and gastronomy
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of unique museums, culinary delights, and local experiences that evoke a sense of adventure and culture.
